Articles.Content:
Without pictures of your craft, it's really hard to say why they may be unstable.
what did i just say? IMAGES WE NEED IMAGES
you might want to turn off aerodynamic failures.

Although, like others, I have to insist on some pictures. You also don't even say what the failure is, so I am forced to presume that you're having structural failures.

And you know what they say about presuming.

When you presume, you make a pres out of u and me.

At high altitude and velocity it started to wobble, like it's glitched.

BTW one of the parts seems bugged (?):

At high altitude and velocity it started to wobble, like it's glitched.

BTW one of the parts seems bugged (?):

I don't use FAR but FAR doesn't change parts anyway. Mine's fine:

It's probably a problem with symmetry, the hangar's two side symmetry is often buggy as hell.

Edited June 29, 2014 by theend3r

parts are perfectly fine for me, are you using FAR? if so do you have its config file , if the wubble originates from cargo, try get some struts, i had problems in the past whenever i tried to connect tiny sized engines to the main vehicle.
what should I do to have that nice MFD's? Please can anybody tell me how? (i've tried but itsn't work)

Hello guys! I don't know what mod is wrong - Spaceplane, or Deadly Reentry, but i lost my wings at 90 m/s speed.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Unfortunetly i am experiencing lag too, probably because of cockpit (this one that is not inline).

Log shows stack overflow.

http://i.imgur.com/gjkbZBu.jpg

Dleting cockpit doesnt help and exiting VAB only causes infinite loding screen.

look at the screenshot: RasterPropMonitor: INITIALIZATION ERROR, CHECK CONFIGURATION

and where is RPM instructions for this cockpit?

At the moment, KSI (those MFDs for RPM) isn't compatible with RPM 0.17. Remove the Hyomoto folder and it should work.

At the moment, KSI (those MFDs for RPM) isn't compatible with RPM 0.17. Remove the Hyomoto folder and it should work.

Thank you for answer! But without Hyomoto i have only 1 display in cockpit, is there any solution to get all 11 monitors?

Hello guys! I don't know what mod is wrong - Spaceplane, or Deadly Reentry, but i lost my wings at 90 m/s speed.

http://imgur.com/a/ahxz4

Unfortunetly i am experiencing lag too, probably because of cockpit (this one that is not inline).

Log shows stack overflow.

http://i.imgur.com/gjkbZBu.jpg

Dleting cockpit doesnt help and exiting VAB only causes infinite loding screen.

i only exprience lag, when i try to shut down camera FOVs, although the game does resbond after a good 10-15 seconds, it takes a full minute to shut down all of those, is your lag related to this? or it lags out of nothing?

i havent checked log though, so im not sure if its also stack overflow
parts dont line up with the rest of those type of parts, like the b9 ones.

parts dont line up with the rest of those type of parts, like the b9 ones.

Then don't stack them against B9 parts. 2 things: 1, the B9 attach nodes are in the wrong place and 2, most Mk2 B9 parts are availble in this pack - what do you need to attach to these? If SP+ doesn't have it, Porkjet is open to suggestions for new parts

i didnt messed with cameras, it just starts after few minutes by itself

but i will try to turn cameras FOV off next time, maybe this will help

yup, it helped.

Hello guys! I don't know what mod is wrong - Spaceplane, or Deadly Reentry, but i lost my wings at 90 m/s speed.

http://imgur.com/a/ahxz4

Press F3 when that happens. See what the message is about the failure and take a screenshot of that. Show us here.

(could be DREC but you successfully lifted off and are approaching for landing and it happened?)

And no FAR... hmmm.
Is anybody else having crash issues with the new cockpit IVA?
Great mod, alot of the parts should be stock!

Is anybody else having crash issues with the new cockpit IVA?

Get this: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/59005-0-23-5-Release-3-1-Active-Texture-Management-Save-RAM-without-reduction-packs%21

If that doesn't help then provide more information. such as an output_log.txt file
i can confirm that RPM.17 screwes up not only this but several more ivas compleatly, so stay sharp
This pack is so beautiful, it makes me wish I wasn't such a horrid spaceplane pilot.

This pack is so beautiful, it makes me wish I wasn't such a horrid spaceplane pilot.

please. people learn to fly with spaceplane plus

Hello guys, so after prototype project *GHOST* i decided to make some weird builds for the next couple of projects, and i came up with this.

Fuel is so heavy, has a hard time launching form the run way, but comes back so light,empty areas can be filled with more stuff , such as more fuel but fuel is very heavy, perhaps more wing surfaces?

Javascript is disabled. View full album

needs more struts to wings, wubbles when i try to make pitches, artifical lights, perhaps more wings can allow me to carry start up fuel more efficiently, but ESTHETICS.
GORGEOUS designs! And they're even stock-a-like!
All those night flight images. :C

This pack is so beautiful, it makes me wish I wasn't such a horrid spaceplane pilot.

I've gotten better because of this pack. It made me want to build spaceplanes, real SSTO space planes and I so I dared where I had never dared before.

Remember, failures are just data. You HAVE to learn from your failures; you don't have a choice. Your brain was wired to be made stronger by anything that didn't kill you.
